title: Angel Tears
description: Ezra, a homeless young man on the edge of throwing it all away and Ana, a beautiful and mysterious doctor at a run-down hospital, are star-crossed lovers in this passionate and suspenseful new-adult classic. From opposite sides of the tracks, drawn to each other by fate, Ezra must save the woman he loves before her menacing boyfriend, Dr. Vito Kreas, discovers Ana holds the key to saving the world.~ Follow the author on Twitter, Vine, & Instagram @MDCisME
author: Milan Cucuk
